title: ollama/ollama
summary: The official Ollama project: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama; chat, generate, pull, push, list, copy, delete models via Python.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; works in Node and browsers via the same REST endpoints.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration to use any Ollama-hosted model as an LLM or chat component in LangChain pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, model management, multi-user, dark/light themes, markdown, code highlight).

title: ollama-chroma
summary: Example repo showing how to combine Ollama embeddings with Chroma vector DB for local semantic search.

title: ollama-cli
summary: A friendly interactive CLI wrapper around Ollama with conversation history, syntax highlighting, and prompt templates.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community-maintained Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support and horizontal scaling.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Simple retrieval-augmented-generation demo using Ollama embeddings + FAISS for local document Q&A.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client library for Ollama with Spring Boot starters and reactive streaming support.

title: ollama-copilots
summary: VS Code extension that brings Ollama models into the editor as local coding copilots with autocomplete and chat pane.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Lightweight Tauri-based desktop GUI for chatting with Ollama models offline on Windows/Mac/Linux.

title: ollama-nest
summary: TypeScript NestJS module that exposes Ollama endpoints as REST/GraphQL APIs with swagger docs.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-django
summary: Reusable Django app that adds Ollama chat endpoints, admin UI, and async task queue for long generations.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat component template that connects to local Ollama for quick prototyping of LLM apps.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community C#/.NET client for Ollama with async streaming and dependency-injection friendly client.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing typed async bindings to the Ollama REST API with tokio and serde.

title: ollama-go
summary: Official Go client library generated from Ollama OpenAPI spec; chat, generate, pull, push, list, copy, delete.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-host Discord bot that lets users chat with any Ollama model via slash commands in Discord servers.
